mapper.select: select imb.id, imb.code, case when imt.name is null then imb.name else imt.name end as name, imb.resource_level, imb.parent_code, imb.type, imb.sort, imb.is_default, imb.icon, imb.category, imb.page_permission_code, imb.object_version_number, imp.required, ip2.path as route, ip.id permission_id, ip.code permission_code, ip.description as permission_description, ip.permission_type as permission_type from iam_menu_b imb left join iam_menu_tl imt on imb.id = imt.id and imt.lang = #{lang} left join iam_menu_permission imp left join iam_permission ip on imp.permission_code = ip.code on imb.code = imp.menu_code left join iam_permission ip2 on imb.page_permission_code = ip2.code where imb.type != 'top' and imb.resource_level = #{level}

select imb.id, imb.code, imb.service_code, imb.parent_code, imb.icon, imb.sort, imb.type, imt.name, imb.resource_level, ip.path as route from iam_menu_b imb left join iam_menu_tl imt on imb.id=imt.id and imt.lang='zh_CN' left join iam_permission ip on imb.page_permission_code=ip.code where imb.resource_level = #{sourceType} and imb.TYPE = 'menu' or (
1 = 1
( imb.PAGE_PERMISSION_CODE in ( select irp.PERMISSION_CODE from iam_role_permission irp left join iam_role ir on irp.ROLE_CODE = ir.CODE left join iam_member_role imr on ir.ID = imr.ROLE_ID where ir.IS_ENABLED = 1 and imr.MEMBER_ID = #{userId} and imr.MEMBER_TYPE = 'user' and imr.SOURCE_ID = #{sourceId} and imr.SOURCE_TYPE = #{sourceType}) or ip.IS_LOGIN_ACCESS=1 or ip.IS_PUBLIC_ACCESS=1 )
and imb.CODE in ( select fcm.MENU_CODE from fd_category_menu fcm where fcm.CATEGORY_CODE in
#{category}
and fcm.RESOURCE_LEVEL=#{sourceType} )
and imb.CODE in ( select fcm.MENU_CODE from fd_category_menu fcm where fcm.CATEGORY_CODE=#{parentCategory} and fcm.RESOURCE_LEVEL='organization_project')
)
